Happy Feet! Try reflexology for £22. Don't be scared of your feet! Come and enjoy this effective, powerful and relaxing treatment which has origins in ancient Eastern cultures. Involves foot bath, massage and pressure techniques on your feet promoting relaxation, circulation and pain relief. Reflexology has benefits for the whole body and body systems.
